channel.title: Smithers/Monty on eric hambro
channel.description: Recent content in Smithers/Monty on eric hambro

item.title: monty
item.description: Monty is a repository of bots that work with the smithers poker bot engine. Write Up Coming Soon The Stack python3.5 pyzmq numpy Github

item.title: smithers
item.description: Smithers is a poker bot server in C++. It allows your bots to play poker against each other very fast. It is written in C++ because when C++ is your hammer, everything is a thumb. Write Up Coming Soon The Stack C++ ZMQ websockets Docker Github
